::: callout-note
#### Anaysis Beta

The analysis functions described below are available only in the development version of Inspect. To install the development version from GitHub:

``` bash
pip install git+https://github.com/UKGovernmentBEIS/inspect_ai
```

Functions are exported from the **inspect_ai.analysis.beta** module during the period of initial community review. They will be moved to the main namespace (with aliases preserved) before the next PyPI release.
:::
